text:
e="preserve">Nonnie Griffin (October 22, 1933 – June 7, 2019) was a Canadian actress and voice actress. She was born in Toronto, Ontario. Her stage work includes "Hello, Dolly!". She had live-action acting and voice acting roles in ', ', "King of Kensington", ', "Forever Knight", "Bizarre" and "Strange Paradise". She also appeared in the movies ', "The Believers", "Good Fences" and "If You Could See What I Hear".
Griffin died of a ruptured aortic aneurysm on June 7, 2019. She was 85.

annotations.surface_form: If You Could See What I Hear
